idea: Gifthos is a fintech and Neo banking SAAS based platform with multiple solutions around customer engagement , employee engagement , channel partner management , loyalty and gratifications for the corporates. We create unique white label platforms for brands/ corporates. We design ,source and manage these engagement programs across gifting, shopping , travel ,health and wellness etc through prepaid cards , gift cards/vouchers, gifting products and various other solutions
name: Gifthos

idea: To carry on the business of buy, assemble, sell, import, export, distribute, process and deal in all kinds of automobiles, descriptions, automotive and other gears, transmission and other axles, universal joints, springs, leaves, head lamps, sealed beams, induction hardened pins, axles, alloy springs, accessories and fittings of all kinds vehicles and parts thereof and to carry on the business of automobile workshops, undertake, carry out repair, maintenance and other services for all kinds of vehicles and automobiles and to convert internal combustion and other engines, chassis-bodies and other components, parts and accessories and all machinery, implements, utensils, appliances, apparatus, lubricants, solutions enamels and all things capable of being used for, in, or in connection with maintenance, and working of motors in the hybrid and EV automobiles based on in house or procured technologies. To work on the own brand for sell, repair, servicing, etc. of automobiles and related areas through own workshops and/or third party workshops
name: GREEN TIGER MOBILITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are the pH Group, a group of advertising specialists with years of agency and entertainers with years of performing experience, now on the road to starting something different.


OUR MOTTO: Be ALWAYS STRATEGICALLY CREATIVE!

pH Group finds the right balance between technology and creativity.
name: pH Group

idea: MyBharatNet brings to you robust technology to empower the future of Internet. An efficiently designed hyper speed network on Gigabit Passive Optical Network(GPON) connecting Fiber To The Home(FTTH).
name: MYBHARAT NET PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our company is launching Data and Voice Services. Company is DoT licensed Service provider with State of the Art Network Operations Centre. All services are monitored 24x7 to provide best uptime and support to our esteemed customers.

We offer Truly Unlimited High Speed Plans, Fiber to Home, 24 Hour Support and Ever growing network. Our firm brings to you robust technology to empower the future of Internet. We provide an efficiently designed hyper speed network on Gigabit Passive Optical Network (GPON) connecting Fiber to the Home (FTTH). OUR network delivered directly to home for the Ultra Speed experience.

Our high end Gigabit FTTH Router with Dual Band Wi-Fi capability will be provided free of cost and is easy on the pocket by charging minimal as a refundable security deposit. We also connect various corporate houses with our high quality leased line services. We strive to be cost-effective, sustainable, scalable, and accessible so that all of our services can be easily integrated into our customers’ home or organization.

 We aim to achieve the high standards we set for ourselves and to continue to provide high quality services to our customers. All our internet plans are provides high speed internet services. Our support team is here for you 24/7 and 365 days. And we guarantee high-quality satellite connection all over the world. We’re local members to the communities we serve which allows us to get your services up and running in a day. Our network applications and enhances value added services by using broadband technology to Internet providing a delivery and management of Internet multimedia content platform for Internet.
name: TINTECH ONLINE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
HCS Global Alliance Private Limited is a young, seasoned, first-generation, asset-light hospitality startup.

We are into Hospitality Consulting, advisory & management.

We consult individually designed lifestyle food & beverage spaces like restaurants, lounges, diners and also into hotels & resorts management.

The company keeps in touch with the millennial & young at heart modern traveller through great interiors, detail-driven comforts and cutting-edge technology, all done in our signature style. Founded by Mr Upendra Kulkarni & Mr Chinmay Rege in 2019, HCS-GC is looking forward to taking the brand to a larger, international audience. HCS-GC aims to help people to enjoy a rich, diverse palate with local & gourmet meals and leisure experiences.

We have 6 different service products in which we serve the client hospitality solutions keeping in mind the latest technology, utmost professionalism and very much Indian values of Hospitality.

in our Beta Audit Product, we have developed a unique step by step proprietary auditing solution in various modules that will help all the Hoteliers to minimise the costs and increase the profits.

Our Mission

Our mission is to evolve in our businesses, keeping the right balance with our values and helping all our stakeholders with our unique products and services in the global hospitality industry

Our Vision

Our vision is to deliver innovative, marketable, authentic consulting solutions for the hospitality and foodservice franchise industry, which will support the overall development of Global Hospitality Businesses.
name: HCS GLOBAL ALLIANCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SCES is accredited by Government of India, Department of Science & Technology. “National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories (NABL)” and committed all time to implementing all provisions of ISO 17025: 2005. SCES offers Soil Investigation, Consultancy and testing facility for Civil engineering materials for construction industry. It has been set up keeping in view the growing need for such a facility in and around Mumbai, Thane and Navi Mumbai, wherein large number of infrastructure development projects are underway.


Quality control of construction materials is fundamental to the production of long lasting structures that will satisfy the design performance requirements.
name: SHREE CONMAT ENGINEERING SERVICES

idea: This is a socio-economic venture for the poor barber community. During the lockdown, many of them lost their livelihood during the pandemic. This app will help the beneficiary to get hygienic and low-cost saloon service from skilled and trained beauticians. This will be an easy to use and completely digital service.
name: SMART SENA

idea: We are a B2B eCommerce company providing our products to Home-based sellers, women entrepreneurs, resellers & online sellers on dropship basis at a wholesale price.
name: Wholesaledock LLP

idea: The foundation of the business consists of services such as Contract Logistics 3PL Warehousing, and Transportation and one point solution for all supply chain management needs.
name: APOLO IMPEX SOLUTION LLP
